document_data.name: Wildlands Rest
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wildlands Rest''' was a wayside inn in the frontier land of the [[Silver Marches]]. It was a safe and secure place for travelers to rest for the night.
document_data.Location: The Wildlands Rest was located in the region of [[Delzoun|Old Delzoun]] at [[the Fork]], the place where the [[Adbar Road]] from [[Citadel Adbar]] and the [[Fork Road]] from [[Sundabar]] met.
document_data.Structure: The building was built of stone and looked more like a blockhouse than an inn. Over time, its owners constantly expanded its size.
document_data.History:
The Wildlands Rest was founded in [[1371 DR]] by [[Grumbelham Goldhand]], a male [[dwarf]] and [[Irvag|Irvag the Bear]], a male [[human]]. The entrepreneurial partners were retired adventurers.

[[Orc]] bands in the area tried to attack the inn on more than one occasion, but the old adventurers drove them away.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The inn was located near [[Ghaurin's Hold]], an old dwarven ruin rumored to contain lost treasures.
